attributes.action: ensure political parties are funded solely by voluntary public donation, and that limited public resources are not plundered for the the purposes of party gain and vested political interests, as opposed to the general public good
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Political parties and their representatives exist to serve the public. The success they achieve in doing so will be reflected in the level of support they receive through membership and donations. If income generated is insufficient for their needs then this is indicative of their failure to fulfil their purpose. In any other business or household, expenditure is based on income.It is no more valid for political parties to raid the public coffers to sustain their activities than it would be for Ford to do the same to sell Mondeos - it is anti democratic and corrupt. 

In summary, If you haven't got it,dont spend it - dont steal it off us!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
